channel.title: Mentos + Diet Coke trick
channel.description:
Some notes before i get started:- i know alot of people already know about this, but i just wanted to let other people who dont know about it know, and also make the people who know about it try it for themselves, beleive me it is alot of fun.
Ok so alot of you probably know what happends when you mix vinegar with bicarbinate of soda, well they fizz up together basically. Well basically it is like that but more powerfull.
What you will need:- a couple of mentos (a pack hopefully) [1] A bottle of [b]DIET[/b]coke (biggest you can get) [1] A place your not worried about getting coke spilt everywhere [1]
Ok so you can sort out an action plan on how you are going to do this yourself, but basically you can lob a mento or two into the Coke bottle... you should get good results, you can modify it again and again to change how you do it, say more mentos, or less coke, but you will need more coke.
I did this today in my girlfriends shower, let me tell you i was not ready for what happened, my girlfriend recorded it on her phone also, i shall try uploading the video soon, but basically i was hoping to chuck the mentos in and screw the lid down, didnt have time for that tho, the coke went all up the shower walls. :) anyways not very good tut but i thought id share this with some people and get other people to try it.
notes:- remember you need diet coke, normal coke just doesnt have the good enough effect, not sure about other fizzy drinks though.
Ok just uploaded the video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hl2evNej-JU remember i litterally just dropped them in and it went everywhere

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

typenamehere:

haha i love your accent

-_- you know how to make a man feel small heheh!
i was thinking about not uploading it because i say something gay during it… i sound like a girl, you can also hear my gf laffin, anyways yuh.

[quote=“james, post:6, topic:20563”]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KRbD9udaLnU&NR

how do they do the thing were they crack it against the ground and it flies[/quote]
ok im not quite sure, but i think they get a 2L bottle, put mentos in and screw the cap on, the pressure builds inside, then they throw it at the ground and it smashes a small hole into it and it flies as the pressure is released

Read full topic

item.description:
@Andrewsouls wrote:

lol coke mentos is great fun in the bottle, what about in your stomach,???
I saw a video of a guy who drank a whole bottle of diet coke, then paused, swallowed like 4 mentos tablets, lozenges or whatever, and lol it just came out… umm yeah and it feels like shit

a couple of mentos (a pack hopefully) [1]
